title: ACID Pro 10 Suite [PC Download]
description: ACID Pro 10 Suite is the first digital audio workstation that allows you to deconstruct any song into its individual tracks to remix into a new masterpiece – thanks to optimized audio source separation technology and the new STEM MAKER 2 powered by zynaptiq.With a redesigned MIDI Playable Chopper (MPC) with transient detection, the new Celemony Melodyne essentials, exclusive virtual instruments, effect plug-ins and samples as well as Xfer Serum Advanced Wavetable Synthesizer – available exclusively in ACID Pro 10 Suite – it's the ultimate DAW for experimental music producers and beat artists.

Additional Requirements: Minimum system requirements: Microsoft Windows 10 | 8 | 7; 1 GHz processor; 1 GB RAM; 700 MB of hard drive space for program installation, up to 16 GB for included instruments and loopsInternet connection: Required for registering and validating the program, as well as for individual program functions. Program requires one-time registration.
